ygData.subject: Wanted to Buy
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, fellow denizens of Norrath! I am in the market for following magical items: Elfhide gloves Barbed, Bloodstained, Bone, and Lupine armor pieces Black Iron
ygData.messageBody:
Hail, fellow denizens of Norrath!

I am in the market for following magical items:

Elfhide gloves
Barbed, Bloodstained, Bone, and Lupine armor pieces
Black Iron Girdle
Collar of Undead Protection
Electrum Bracelet
Feather Leggings
Grotesque Mask
Leering Mask

Reed Ding

Cerrated Bone Dirk
Ashenwood Short Spear
Demon Claw
Jambiya
Runed Bone Fork

I also have a cracked darkwood shield I would be willing to trade for some
of the things on the above list.

Finally, I am looking to buy venom sacs from spiders and poisonous snakes
-- crag spiders and terrorantulas in particular.

Please feel free to escroll me at Montes5@... or contact me
in-game if you are looking to sell or trade any of the above.

Safe hunting!

Montes Darkwisp
Scout of Tunare of the 20th Dagger
Order of the Sylvyr Gryphon
